entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus' face was bruised and puffy. He is one of the people staying in the hideout.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as 'the man' who really gets the room and has been providing food for them.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as someone Seamus met in the passage to Hog's Head.

relationships.description: Neville 'really gets this room' and has been able to make it work for their needs.
Seamus met Aberforth in the passage to Hog's Head.
